parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly refers to the UDMR party and promotes their team for Ilfov County.  The image shows a group of candidates, and the text "Poziția 4 pe buletinul de vot" clearly indicates their position on the ballot. This directly relates to Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, targeting a wide audience, not a private communication. The reach estimate is ">1M", indicating a broad dissemination intended to reach many people. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to choose the UDMR party (position 4 on the ballot) in the Ilfov County elections. The slogans "Alege vocea rațiunii! România pe primul loc!" and the visual representation of the candidate team clearly aim to influence voting behavior. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. The post lacks the characteristics of journalistic reporting. It does not present objective information or diverse perspectives. Instead, it promotes a specific political party and its candidates, advocating for their election.  It is clearly promotional material, not journalistic.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post does not express a personal opinion; it is a clear and direct appeal for votes for a specific political party. The content is overtly promotional and intended to sway voters.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>931203648367320</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, with ad_archive_id "931203648367320", is a paid advertisement promoting the UDMR party's candidates for the Ilfov County elections.  The post uses slogans ("Alege vocea rațiunii! România pe primul loc!"), displays the candidates' photos, and explicitly states their position on the ballot ("Poziția 4 pe buletinul de vot").  The high reach estimate (">1M") and the use of paid advertising demonstrate an intention to influence a large number of voters.  The content clearly surpasses the limits of journalistic reporting, focusing instead on direct electoral promotion.  While the post does not contain a CMF number, the other elements strongly suggest it is electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Demeter András István</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>UDMR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
RMDSZ/UDMR, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 931203648367320), după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează direct candidații UDMR pentru alegerile parlamentare din Ilfov, folosind slogane precum "Alege vocea rațiunii! România pe primul loc!" și indicând poziția lor pe buletinul de vot ("Poziția 4 pe buletinul de vot").  Reclama, cu o estimare a acoperirii de peste 1 milion de persoane, depășește limitele activității jurnalistice, având ca obiectiv clar influențarea votului în favoarea UDMR.  Această acțiune constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei de campanie.  Reclama a fost plătită cu o sumă sub 100 RON, conform datelor din Ad Library, și a fost accesibilă prin link-ul [https://www.facebook.com/ads/library/?active_status=active&ad_type=political_and_issue_ads&country=RO&is_targeted_country=false&media_type=all&q=UDMR&search_type=keyword_unordered].  Persoana de contact este Demeter András István, demeterandras@rmdsz.ro, +40745600964.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
